title: 820-3787 does not see ssd in start up
message:
Got in an 820-3787.  It boots into my external drive. it does not see the ssd in the start up.  If i open disk utility's it show the ssd. I have tried multiple ssd's.  i also dont believe the wifi is working. Any Suggestions? 
Thanks

title: 820-3787 does not see ssd in start up
message:
Is the original SSD worked before in the same board?
I asked because of possible APFS issue.
In such case, do fresh install of HS, or Mojave; this will update BIOS to support APFS.

title: 820-3787 does not see ssd in start up
message:
Yeah it was an APFS issue, all was fixed with a quick re install. 
Thanks Again
